title: Sleep Induction Mat
description: The Bulletproof Sleep Induction Mat is a tool that helps you fall asleep faster, feel more refreshed and improve overall energy levels. Try it tonight.

SUBSCRIBE AND SAVE 20% You're currently using an unsupported browser. For the best possible experience, [please upgrade to a modern web browser](#upgrade-browser). The Bulletproof Sleep Induction Mat helps you relax, feel more refreshed and improve overall energy levels. Made with organic hemp and cotton, this acupressure mat supports relaxation, energy and improved sleep quality. Just roll it out, lay down and stimulate acupressure points that promote a deep relaxation response.
